name: Disable Magpie RSS Cache
author: Bala Krishna

sections.description:
Allow user to enable/disable wordpress magpie rss cache from wordpress admin panel.

Follow Me

Follow me on Twitter to keep up with the latest updates Bala Krishna
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrader, or you can install the plugin manually.

  1. You can either use the automatic plugin installer or your FTP program to upload it to your wp-content/plugins directory the top-level folder. Don’t just upload all the php files and put them in /wp-content/plugins/.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to Tools -> Disable RSS Cache

  4. On the plugin admin page select Enable/Disable from dropdown menu and submit to save your options.

  5. Browse web page that are showing content from external feed. You should see feed content immediately when new post arrive.

  6. That’s it!
